welcome_message_body: Welcome to Terrebonne, Canada, where you'll discover the charming blend of history and modernity. Known for its picturesque old town and vibrant cultural scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Brûlerie de la Rivière
restaurants.description: Brûlerie de la Rivière is a café located in Terrebonne.

restaurants.name: Le Snobinard
restaurants.description: Le Snobinard is a breakfast spot located in Terrebonne.
restaurants.address: 271 Boulevard Des Braves, Terrebonne QC J6W 3H6

restaurants.name: Lazio - Artisan Culinaire

restaurants.name: Au Just Thaï
restaurants.description: Au Just Thaï is a asian restaurant located in Terrebonne.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Mirabel Airport, primarily used for charter and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
